comments.body:
It can't take a dependency on runtime here unfortunately.

On Mon, Jan 4, 2016 at 3:57 PM, David Eads notifications@github.com wrote:

> In cmd/gendeepcopy/deep_copy.go
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/17922#discussion_r48780174
> :
> 
> > @@ -61,7 +61,7 @@ func pkgPath(group, version string) string {
> >         group = "api"
> >     }
> >     gv := group
> > -   if version != "" {
> > -   if version != "__internal" {
> 
> "__internal" should be a constant.
> 
> â€”
